title: The Good Dev
subtitle: Final project for Le Wagon
description: Fully functional app created in only 2 weeks by a team of 3 for our final project. The Good Dev is a platform to make volunteering process easy for developers as well as programming more accessible for organisations and communities lacking a budget. The roles would be all over the word with the option to work abroad and exchange cultures. Built with: Ruby on Rails, Javascript, PostgreSQL, HTML and CSS whilst also working as a team on Github/Heroku.
